餹字的基本解释

餹
táng
古同“糖”。

餹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［táng］
［《廣韻》徒郎切，平唐，定。］
亦作“饄1”。
原指饴糖。后泛指糖。

餹字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　餹； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1423第25
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒郞切，音唐。【玉篇】餹䬾，餌也。【廣韻】餹䬾，黍膏。【揚子·方言】餳謂之餹。【本草】飴卽軟餹。凡粳粟火麻白米皆堪作，惟糯米作者入藥。　【集韻】或作糖糛餳。

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［táng］
["Guangyun" Tu Langqie, Ping Tang, Ding. ]
Also known as "饄1".
Originally refers to caramel. After referring to sugar.
餹
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Shizi Department】　餹; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1423-25
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Tu Yunqie, Yin Tang. 【Jade articles】Tie and Yi, bait too. [Guang Yun] 餹䬾, millet ointment. 【Yangtze Dialect】Sugar is called 餹. 【Materia Medica】Yellow glutinous rice noodles. All japonica millet and hemp white rice can be used as medicine, but the author of glutinous rice is used as medicine.　【Jiyun】Or as syrup.
